EXISTING STRUCTURES
────────────────────────
### Resource Depot & Smelting Facility at base position (x=-4.5, y=18.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Wooden Chest at position (x=-4.5, y=18.5) serving as the central storage depot.
- Stone Furnace at position (x=-3.0, y=19.0) used for smelting iron ore into iron plates.
- Stone Furnace at position (x=-4.0, y=21.0) used for processing copper ore into copper plates.

### Automation Lab at position (x=-7.5, y=18.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Lab at position (x=-7.5, y=18.5) used for submitting Automation Science Packs for research.

ERROR TIPS
────────────────────────
- Inventory and Ingredient Management:
  • Confirm that the required entity exists in inventory before attempting placement (e.g. lab placement at (1.0, 19.0) failed due to no lab in inventory).
  • Verify that all necessary crafting ingredients are available before initiating a crafting process (e.g. missing iron-gear-wheel caused a failure in lab crafting).

- Entity Placement and Spacing:
  • Ensure placement positions are clear of obstructions and collisions; adjust spacing, direction, or reference positions to avoid interference from nearby entities (e.g. repeated lab placement errors adjacent to the Wooden Chest where a furnace was blocking).
  • Confirm the player is within the allowed placement range when positioning an entity.

- Technology and Recipe Requirements:
  • Complete all prerequisite research before attempting to craft technology-dependent items (e.g. solar panel crafting requires unlocking solar-energy technology).

- Raw Resource and Sub-Ingredient Sourcing:
  • Gather required raw resources in advance to support sub-ingredient production (e.g. secure stone to craft a stone-furnace, which is needed for boiler production).

- Attribute Handling:
  • Access entity positional attributes as properties rather than invoking them as functions.
